abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Gorbolga is 3.

abilities.name: Warlord of the First Circle
abilities.description: Abraxia commands the Swords of Chaos with relentless brutality.
abilities.effect: If a friendly Varanguard unit uses the 'Relentless Killers' ability while it is wholly within 12" of this unit, that unit does not have Strike-last as a result of that ability.

abilities.name: Blood of Molten Varanite
abilities.description: Any who wound the Thanatorg risk being splashed by its highly mutative blood.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice each time a damage point inflicted by a combat attack is allocated to this unit. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Roar of Domination
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.description: The Thanatorg is quick to put potential usurpers of Abraxia's power in their place.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Gorbolga the Accurs'd
abilities.description: A 'gift' from the Everchosen, Gorbolga is a varanite spear that carries a potent mutative curse – but should its wielder's will slip, they too will learn of its hunger…
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat, roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect:

1 Uncontrollable Power: Allocate 1 damage point to this unit.
2 The Spear Slumbers: No effect.
3-5 White-hot Varanite: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's Gorbolga for the rest of the turn.
6 Rampant Mutation: The effect of 'White-hot Varanite' applies and this unit's Gorbolga has Crit (Mortal) for the rest of the turn.
